posts.title: Hello World!
posts.text: So, I’ve decided to start a blog. I’m not really a social media type, but I’m going to aim for at least one post every two weeks, with some of my acomplishments and a guide to help you achieve the same. The blog is mostly going to be about tech, with some tutorials to help you guys out! I hope you enjoy what is to come in the following weeks, months and yeard. Jay :-)
